title: I can't install league of legends on my pc
body: So I was playing lol with my friends and it all went well but the next day when I started the client and I couldnt start the client couse it said:the older version of league of legends cannot be removed. I tried everything I Uninstaller lol,I checked my apps  on the control panel and league of legends was nowhere to be found.I tried to installed the game again and it said  the same thing (the older version of league of legends cannot be removed) plz help idk what to do.

replies.body: This sounds like your client noticed some errors with the recent patch it downloaded and is now trying to repatch to make sure all the files are okay. If it keeps getting hung up like that, we can try forcing a manual repatch by using this [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) with **Force Repatch** turned on. Give that a go and let me know!
Yeah but I tried to install it I didn't start it but I couldn't and it just said the same thing that the older version cannot be removed.
